points.point1: Built a fullstack PWA, installable on iOS/Android.
points.point2: Implemented user authentication and data persistence with MongoDB.
points.point3: Implemented data validation with Zod and schema-based access control, ensuring robust security and user permissions.
points.point4: Designed a responsive UI with CSS Modules and React Router.

points.point1: Built a fullstack MERN application for task management.
points.point2: Designed REST API with Express and Mongoose with CRUD operations.
points.point3: Implemented user authentication with JWT and secured routes.
points.point4: Optimized frontend with responsive design and CSS Modules for a seamless user experience.

points.point1: Built a weather application using React and Tailwind CSS.
points.point2: Integrated with OpenWeather API for real-time weather data.
points.point3: Implemented GeoDB API for location search.

points.point1: Built a box-shadow generator tool using vanilla JavaScript.
points.point3: Added customizable options for shadow properties.

points.point1: Built a sticky notes application using vanilla JavaScript
points.point3: Integrated local storage for persistent note storage.
